job_description:
Company Description

HSS SOFT is an Equal Employment Opportunity Employer

Job Description

Position: Python Developer

Location: New York

Job Type: Full Time Job

Required Skills:
• 8+ years of solid programming experience in C++, Java, or other OO language
• 3-4 years of experience in Python.
• Thorough understanding of Python basic concepts like Lists, Strings, Indexing, Slicing, Tuples and Dictionaries.
• Familiar with Python Object Oriented concepts like creating classes, constructors, overloading and modules.
• Familiar with NumPy and Pandas.
• Advanced topics like iterators, generators, dynamic code execution, regular expressions in Python.
• Knowledge of big data environments is desired, using Pydoop library.
• Experience with PL SQL.
• Knowledge of version and revision control practices and procedures.

Qualifications

Python, JAVA, C++

Additional Information

All your information will be kept confidential according to EEO guidelines.

Qualifications: 8+ years of solid programming experience in C++, Java, or other OO language
3-4 years of experience in Python
Thorough understanding of Python basic concepts like Lists, Strings, Indexing, Slicing, Tuples and Dictionaries
Familiar with Python Object Oriented concepts like creating classes, constructors, overloading and modules
Familiar with NumPy and Pandas
Advanced topics like iterators, generators, dynamic code execution, regular expressions in Python
Experience with PL SQL

job_description:
Job Summary

Looking for Jr. python developer or entry-level python developer or back end developer in our technical team to built software and to support client site developer or a front-end developer. You will be responsible for writing the code at the server-side and you will also responsible for managing the interchange of data between server and client. You will also respond to request from the front end therefor a basic understanding of front-end technologies is necessary. Your primary focus will be on the development of server-side logic.

Qualification

· Bachelor's/Master's degree in computer science or related field.

· Should have 0-3 years of working experience as well as a python developer.

Responsibilities

· Create functions for data calculation (arithmetic functions with conditions).

· Engage and be actively involved in customer requirements.

· Perform assigned daily tasks and respond immediately to issues/problems.

· Involve in unit/integration testing frameworks and practices.

· Design Implement and Interacting with databases.

· Maintain and troubleshoot complex systems.

·

Should have 0-3 years of working experience as well as a python developer

job_description:
Responsibilities:
• Hands-on & In-depth knowledge of Python application programming concepts, Django, Flask
• Experience in Python, Django REST framework (or any other for building Web APIs)
• Create services as part of back-end: message intake and processing pipelines (message flow), REST APIs for front-end, data manipulation (JSON,XML, flat), external services calling.
• Including Pandas, Pytest, Exception handling, Multithread concepts / Asyncio, gRPC (python microservices concepts)
• Participate in architectural, design and product discussions.
• Experience in Agile/Scrum based project execution.
• Client is technology agnostic, and they will be tested mainly on their thinking approach, Analytical and problem-solving abilities
• Good SQL knowledge, PostGres & Snowflake
• Good understanding of AWS concepts
• Experience in CI/CD DevOps methodology
• Should have handled complex projects and should be hands-on.

Good to Have:
• Knowledge on Cloud App services, Load Balancer, Application Gateway
• Hand on with Cloud services – preferably Azure
• Experience in NoSQL Database and in-memory Database
• Experience in Unit testing frameworks
• Strong Knowledge on CI/CD using Jenkins/Bamboo
• Working Knowledge on Dockers/Kubernetes

Pay: $50.00 - $55.00 per hour

job_description:
Senior Python Engineer – New York - $150k-$180k

Location: Manhattan, New York

Salary: $150,000 - $180,000

Industry: Travel

Tech Stack: Python, Django, Flask, Kubernetes, CI/CD, AWS 👩🏻💻

Great opportunity for a talented Senior Backend Engineer (Python, Django, Flask, AWS) to join a scaling travel business allowing individual travel agents to connect people with their dream holidays.

The Company 🚀

Growing travel business that provide an entire back office system for travel agents. Their 3-strong founding team are on a mission to build a next generation travel platform to give the world access to their dream destinations.

The Role ✨

They are seeking a skilled Engineer (Python, Django, Flask, AWS) to be responsible for the integration and scaling up of their data platforms.

The successful Engineer’s (Python, Django, Flask, AWS) primary responsibilities will include architecting, building and developing their systems.

This is a great opportunity to work directly their core platform (Python, Django, Flask, AWS) and build out greenfield products used by hundreds of thousands of customers daily.

Desired Skills ⚙️
• Python
• Django, Flask
• Docker, Kubernetes
• REST
• AWS
• Distributed Systems
• Systems Design

Benefits 🏖
• Full medical insurance
• 401(k)
• Ability to book travel for friends and family and earn commission
• Two full remote working weeks encouraged

If you are a skilled Engineer (Python, Django, Flask, AWS) who is interested in this role then please apply below and I will be in touch with more details.

Responsibilities: They are seeking a skilled Engineer (Python, Django, Flask, AWS) to be responsible for the integration and scaling up of their data platforms
The successful Engineer’s (Python, Django, Flask, AWS) primary responsibilities will include architecting, building and developing their systems
This is a great opportunity to work directly their core platform (Python, Django, Flask, AWS) and build out greenfield products used by hundreds of thousands of customers daily

job_description:
Our client is a leading quantitative investment company with a focus on computer-driven trading for global financial markets utilizing the firm’s proprietary, state-of-the-art technology & data platform. They company harnesses the power of data and advanced technologies to drive innovative strategies and superior investment returns. We are now seeking an exceptional Software Engineer to join their busy, growing, and successful team.

Software Engineer

Manhattan, NY

4 days on site, 1 remote

$110-175K plus excellent benefits package.

You must be a US citizenship, Green Card holder or transfer of a current H-1B Visa is also available if required.

To be successful in this role:
• You will be a confident Software Engineer with 2-4 years experience and the following required skills, qualifications and experience:
• Undergraduate degree in CS, EE, or a related field
• Two years professional experience in software engineering
• Programming experience in Python (relational databases and SQL a plus)
• While a background in finance is beneficial, it is not mandatory

Position summary:

This role offers a unique opportunity to work at the forefront of systematic trading, where innovation and quantitative analysis intersect. The company is passionate about implementing scientific and mathematical methods to explore and solve problems in the global financial markets. If you thrive in a fast-paced, data-driven environment, we encourage you to apply.

Job role and responsibilities:

As a Software Engineer, you will join the Core Technology team as a key player in building and scaling the company’s central infrastructure, participating in greenfield projects as well as enhancing existing systems. As part of a small, focused team, you will report directly to the Co-CTOs and will collaborate closely with team members and end users, having immediate firmwide impact and gaining exposure to all areas of the firm such as data, research, operations, and risk.

Key responsibilities for this role include:
• Develop efficient, scalable data and research infrastructure
• Implement robust workflows for processing structured and unstructured financial datasets
• Contribute to internal microservice-based infrastructure platform
• Develop web-based tools for internal teams and users

Qualifications: You must be a US citizenship, Green Card holder or transfer of a current H-1B Visa is also available if required
You will be a confident Software Engineer with 2-4 years experience and the following required skills, qualifications and experience:
Undergraduate degree in CS, EE, or a related field
Two years professional experience in software engineering
While a background in finance is beneficial, it is not mandatory
